title: Happy Birthday, Ai!
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Happy birthday, Ai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ehehe, thank you, Eli! Hey, where is the party gonna be held? I wanna get there as soon as possible!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Hey, hey. Not so fast. Before you go, we need to do some preparation.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Preparation?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I was thinking of getting you a ballet dress for today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Wow! Really~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Last time, I only did your makeup. Today, I’ll get you all dressed up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Awesome!! I’ll be getting that same makeup again!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh? That was just stage makeup......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>No, no! That makeup is great! Please, Eli~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
